channel.title: EcosiaX new 317 server JOIN NOW--looking for staff
channel.description:
[center][center]LINKS: Website: http://ecosiax.net/ Forums: http://ecosiax.net/forums/ Webclient: http://ecosiax.net/webclient.php Downloadable client: On home page
[size=18pt]STAFF IS EARNED. DO NOT BEG FOR STAFF.[/size]
FEATURES - Rev Cave - Working Cannon - Many different bosses. Nomad drops chaotics and claws - Duel Arena - Barrows - Pest Control - Fight Caves - Recipe for Disaster - Summoning - Hunter - Good XP Rates - New Server-new eco - Custom interfaces - Great bossing and pvp - Pk store - 2 donor stores - Auto vote and donation system - Nex armors fully working - Highscores - Comp cape - Normal and duo slayer! - Working cure prayers! - Donor and extreme donor zone!
I hope everybody joins and has a great time. When you Log on, pm eren iffy and tell him that Brandon is the best! :p Cya around... remember Staff is earned. Sorry for only 2 pics, all I could upload. If you want to see more come ingame! [/center][/center]
